name: Puzzle Dot Logic
description:
Puzzle Dot Logic is a simple adventures mind challenging puzzle game.
[How to play]
1. Drag and drop the given blocks into the board.
2. You have to put the given blocks into the board to clear line both vertically and horizontally.
3. Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.
4. The given blocks will be randomly rotated.
